rukus.text: Nufu wa kono yo ni keiji sa reta. `Sudeni shinko shita mono no soto wa, mo anata no min wa shinko shinaidearou.Dakara kare-ra no okonai ni tsuite nayande wa naranai
Soshite ware no menomaede, keiji ni shitagatte hakobune o tsukure. Mata fugi o okonau mono no tame ni (kono Jo) ware ni negaidete wa naranai. Kare-ra wa oborejinudearou

Sokode kare wa hakobune o tsukuri hajimeta. Kare no min no shucho-tachi wa, sono-gawa o sugiru tabi ni kare o chosho shita. Kare wa itta. `Tatoe anata gataga (ima) watashi-tachi o chosho shite mo, izure anata gataga chosho suru yo ni, kitto watashi-tachi ga anata gata o chosho suru yo ni naru
Anata gata wa yagate chijoku no chobatsu ga dare ni kuru ka shirudearou. Towa no chobatsu ga dare no ue ni furikakaru ka o

Tsuini waga meirei wa kudatte, daichi no sho mizu ga seki o kitte hotobashiri deta toki, ware wa itta. `Subete no ikimono no hitotsu ga ito, shinko-sha-tachi to, anata no kazoku de senkoku ga sudeni kudasa reta mono igai o sono naka ni nose nasai.'Daga kare to tomoni shinko shita mono wa sukunakatta
Kare (nufu) wa itta. `Arra no gyomei ni yotte, kore ni nore. Koko ni mo teihaku ni mo sore ni yore. Hontoni watashi no omo wa, kan'yo ni shite jihibukaku ara reru

Hakobune wa kare-ra o nosete yama no yona nami no ue ni ugokidashita. Sonotoki nufu wa (mina kara) hanare teitakare no musuko ni sakende itta. `Musuko yo, watashi to issho ni nore. Fushin-sha-tachi to issho ni ite wa naranai

Musuko wa (kotaete) itta. `Watashi wa yama ni hinan shiyou. Sore wa (Hiroshi) mizu kara sukuudearou.' Kare (nu - fu) wa itta. `Kyo wa arra no o meirei ni yotte kare no jihi ni yokusuru mono no soto wa, nanimono mo sukuwarenai.' Sonotoki 2-ri no ma ni nami ga kite, musuko wa oboreru mono no 1-ri to natta

O kotoba ga atta. `Daichiyo, mizu o nomikome. Ten yo,(ame o) furasu koto o tome nasai.' Mizu wa hiite, jitai wa osamari,(fune wa) judi sanjo ni noriageta. Mata ose rareta. `Fugi o okonau min o oiharae
Nufu wa kare no omo o yonde moshiageta. `Omo yo, watashi no musuko wa (waga)-ka no ichiindesu. Anata no yakusoku wa hontoni shinjitsu de, anata wa saiketsu ni mottomo sugureta okata de ara remasu

Kare wa ose rareta. `Nufu yo, kare wa hontoni anata no kazokude wanai. Kare no okonai wa tadashikunai. Anata no shiranai koto ni tsuite, ware ni motomete wa naranai. Ware wa anata ga muchinamono to na ra nai yo imashimeru

Kare wa moshiageta. `Omo yo, hontoni watashi ka shiri mo shinai koto ni tsuite, anata ni koi motomenai yo, o yurushi o negaimasu. Anata ga watashi o o yurushi ni nari, jihi o atae rarenakereba, watashi wa kitto, shippai-sha no nakama ni narudeshou

(Kare ni) o kotoba ga atta. `Nufu yo, ware kara no heian ni yotte,(fune o) ori nasai. Anata ni shukufuku are, mata anata to tomoni iru oku no hitobito no ue ni mo. (Soto ni) ware ga (sukoshinoaida no seikatsu o) kyoju sa seru hitobito moaruga, kekkyoku kare-ra wa ware kara itamashi chobatsu o ukerudearou

Kore wa ware ga anata ni keiji shita, yugen-kai ni tsuite no shosokudearu. Anata mo anata no hitobito mo izen wa sore o shiranakatta. Dakara taeshino be. (Yoshi) hate wa,-nushi o osoreru mono ni ki suru nodearu
